title: How to Make Caramel Apple Upside Down Cake

steps.headline: Spoon 1/4 cup of butter into a saucepan, letting it melt inside.
While the butter melts, add 1/8 cup whipping cream and 1/2 cup brown sugar into that saucepan, still letting the butter melt.
To make the cake mix variation, mix that cake mix with the cup Greek Yogurt, water, and add the spices to stir together all of these items
Pour the mixture into a greased 9×13 baking pan.
steps.description: Top the mixture with sliced apples. After that layer, spoon the cake mix hybrid on top of it.

steps.headline: Let the cake cool for 10 minutes.
With a spatula, loosen the sides of the cake.
Take a serving tray.
steps.description: Put it on top of the baking dish. Then switch them by flipping it over carefully and letting it sit for 1-2 minutes. Do not let it sit too long, because the moisture builds up. Let the caramel drizzle over and then remove the baking dish.

text: Spoon 1/4 cup of butter into a saucepan, letting it melt inside.  While the butter melts, add 1/8 cup whipping cream and 1/2 cup brown sugar into that saucepan, still letting the butter melt.  Peel and slice apples.  To make the cake mix variation, mix that cake mix with the cup Greek Yogurt, water, and add the spices to stir together all of these items  Pour the mixture into a greased 9×13 baking pan. Top the mixture with sliced apples. After that layer, spoon the cake mix hybrid on top of it. Bake at 350 for 40-45 minutes.  Let the cake cool for 10 minutes.  With a spatula, loosen the sides of the cake.  Take a serving tray. Put it on top of the baking dish. Then switch them by flipping it over carefully and letting it sit for 1-2 minutes. Do not let it sit too long, because the moisture builds up. Let the caramel drizzle over and then remove the baking dish. Serve and enjoy!
